title: [Shield Thyself]
description: Built between two buildings, the narrow shop has a roof of overlapping canopies that are nailed into a series of boarded up windows on either side.  Cobblestones gleam in the ambient light where the smooth stones lining the ground have been scrubbed to a near luminous quality.  Despite the odd construction, the shop is tidy and utilizes old ale casks to create a sturdy table along the western wall.
